name: Platform Engineer
description:
Our company is building FinTech products (both B2B and B2C) for a 70K+ active customers, constantly trying to improve. We're moving fast, data-driven, always learning new things about our customers and finding new ways to make their experience with our products the most satisfying.

We are looking for the Platform Engineer to join our Core Infrastructure Team, which is building very important PaaS system for the whole company (we have there DevOps, Infrastructure engineers, Technical Writers, Python and Golang Developers and Team Lead).

What you will do:

  • Improve and maintenance of orchestration: Kubernetes, Rancher, Rancher2
  • Providing support for Monitoring and Logging systems
  • Demanding Definition of done, providing documentation
  • Following and supporting none-blaming environment. Politnes, ability to listen and provide ideas without conflicts
  • Participate in duties related to Platform activities
  • Maintaining Platform services and applications

You are best equipped for this role if you have:

  • Experience with high load and high availability
  • System administration at least 3 years of experience
  • Ability to decompose any tasks into parts with a proper assignments
  • Awareness of cutting edge technologies, considering in design systems
  • Ability to clearly formulate a technical task for finalizing a specific system that has failed
  • Knowledge in troubleshoot methodologies, finding root causes

We will appreciate excellent experience in any of the following areas:

  • Experience with geo spreading and decentralized technologies
  • Experience in a platform-based development
  • Experience with Telemetry Systems
  • Experience in installing and configuring orchestration systems (Kubernetes)
  • Experience in installing and configuring Apache Kafka

Compensation package:

For remote employees :

  • Medical insurance for employees.
  • Compensation for sports activities.
  • Trip to Cyprus office to get to know your Team (once a year).

For employees who want relocate:

  • Outstanding relocation package to Cyprus.
  • New branded corporate Mini Cooper Countryman S for the employee and the family.
  • Medical insurance for employees and immediate family members.
  • Company fitness center for employees and their spouses.
  • Parking near the office or a bus pass.
  • Kindergarten/school compensation program.
  • The best view of the sea from our own roof bar.
  • We support the relocation of our candidates by providing visa and migration processing and do our best to help them to be successful in the company.
